The current study aim address maternal care within parent program well parent practice emphasize nutrition , hygiene , psychosocial stimulation peer-support , practice problem-solving . Outcomes include child health , growth development , maternal mental health , mother-child interaction , maternal-spousal relation . We hypothesize : 1 . Children parent attend parent program well health , height cognitive/language development post-test , child whose parent opportunity attend parent session . 2 . Parents attend parent program knowledge child development provide home stimulation , dietary diversity preventive health practice parent opportunity attend parent session . 3 . DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Parenting Programs Child Development Maternal Well-being Rural Uganda
